attributes.action: Admit that the Government has sanctioned the production of coal gas again to fill the shortfall of natural gas from the North Sea
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the failing supply of natural gas from the seas surrounding the UK the Government is permitting coal gas to be produced again. This is blended into the main gas supply in increasing amounts (but as yet not in sufficient amounts to require appliances to be re-jetted.) This is both dangerous and re-introduces a toxic gas to the home, unknown to the people.
